title: Authorizes the empire state development corporation to pause, toll or temporarily halt the Columbia University Education Mixed-Use Development Land Use Improvement and Civic Project Modified General Project Plan

abstracts.abstract: Authorizes the empire state development corporation to pause, toll or temporarily halt the Columbia University Education Mixed-Use Development Land Use Improvement and Civic Project Modified General Project Plan adopted by the empire state development corporation on December 18, 2008 until such time that the attorney general has reviewed all aspects of the plan for compliance.

actions.description: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

related_entities.name: COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
